changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.une très grande partie du plugin a été r: a very large part of the plugin has been rewritten including all communication with Sonos (daemon) and certain functionalities have been modified and no longer work as before, notably group management
changelog.md.Probablement Debian 10 mais pas testé et: Probably Debian 10 but not tested and no support possible on this version
changelog.md.Ajout d'une synchro automatique chaque h: Added automatic sync every hour to correct possible desynchronizations
changelog.md.sur chaque Sonos donnant la date de la p: on each Sonos giving the date of the next alarm programmed on this speaker
changelog.md.Optimisation de l'affichage de la pochet: Optimized the display of the cover of the current reading
changelog.md.qui indique si le micro est activé ou no: which indicates whether the microphone is activated or not on Sonos equipped with a microphone
changelog.md.sur les Sonos équipés d'une batterie ind: on Sonos equipped with a battery indicating the battery charge percentage
on Sonos equipped with a battery indicating whether charging is in progress or not
changelog.md.qui gère la balance selon une valeur com: which manages the balance according to a value between -100 (far left) and 100 (far right)
changelog.md.qui gère les graves selon une valeur com: which manages the bass according to a value between -10 and 10
changelog.md.qui gère la aigus selon une valeur compr: which manages the treble according to a value between -10 and 10
changelog.md.qui permet de grouper tous les Sonos ens: which allows you to group all Sonos together
changelog.md.pour lire une radio mp3 directement via: to play an mp3 radio directly via a URL (accessible on the internet for example
changelog.md.qui est très intéressante pour gérer les: which is very useful for managing volume level transitions
changelog.md.Fix un crash du démon si aucun Sonos n'e: Fix daemon crash if no Sonos is discovered
changelog.md.Réécriture quasi totale du plugin, le dé: Almost total rewrite of the plugin, the daemon has been completely rewritten in python (instead of PHP
changelog.md.probablement Debian 10 mais pas testé et: Probably Debian 10 but not tested and no support possible on this version
changelog.md.Il n'y a plus de découverte à lancer man: There is no longer any discovery to launch manually and it is no longer necessary (nor possible) to manually add equipment, the plugin automatically discovers your sound devices and creates the equipment corresponding to each start of the daemon
changelog.md.Il est également possible de demander de: It is also possible to ask to (re)synchronize equipment, favorites and playlists without restarting the daemon from the equipment panel
changelog.md.Mise en jour en (quasi) temps réel des c: (Almost) real-time updating of order information (a delay of 0
changelog.md.5s à quelques secondes max), plus de cro: 5s to a few seconds max), more cron minutes, including when a change is made outside Jeedom (via Sonos app for example
changelog.md.Refonte de la gestion de groupes (les an: Redesign of group management (old commands will be deleted and new ones added, see documentation
changelog.md.Il est possible de joindre ou quitter un: It is possible to join or leave a group, control the playback of the group from any device in the group without worrying about who is the controller
changelog.md.Le volume est lui toujours contrôlé par: The volume is always controlled by speaker
changelog.md.Adaptation sur la fonction Text-to-Speec: Adaptation to the Text-to-Speech (TTS) function, it will be necessary to adapt the SAMBA sharing configuration
changelog.md.plus de perte de mémoire sur le démon et: no more memory loss on the daemon and it consumes less than previously
changelog.md.qui permet de sélectionner le mode de le: which allows you to select the reading mode from the following possibilities
changelog.md.qui donne la valeur \"brut\" de l'état d: which gives the "raw" value of the reading state (the existing command
changelog.md.donne une valeur traduite en fonction de: gives a translated value based on the language configured in Jeedom
changelog.md.indique si l'équipement est groupé ou no: indicates whether the equipment is grouped or not) and
changelog.md.dans le cas où l'équipement est groupé: in the case where the equipment is grouped
changelog.md.Nettoyage des accents dans les noms de p: Cleaning up accents in share names (not supported by the plugin
changelog.md.Suppression de la dependance a PicoTTS (: Removing the dependency on PicoTTS (the plugin uses jeedom's global TTS engine
changelog.md.Mise à jour liste des commandes pour Jee: Update command list for Jeedom v4.3
changelog.md.Support de la nouvelle enceinte SYMFONIS: Support for the new SYMFONISK loudspeaker
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le TTS: Fixed a bug on the TTS
changelog.md.Ajout compatibilité avec la nouvelle enc: Added compatibility with the new SYMFONISK speaker
changelog.md.Ajout compatibilité avec la nouvelle Son: Added compatibility with the new Sonos one
changelog.md.Mise à jour immediate du volume en cas d: Immediate volume update in case of change by Jeedom, thank you @Domochip
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Optimisation du code en cas de Sonos non: Code optimization in case of Sonos not connected
changelog.md.Correction de bug si un sonos n'est pas: Bug fix if a sound system cannot be reached
changelog.md.Amélioration du script d'installation de: Improvement of the dependency installation script (may allow to correct in some cases the problems of TTS
changelog.md.Prise en charge de l'enceinte étagere Ik: Support for Ikea SYMFONISK bookshelf speaker
changelog.md.Correction de bugs dans le cas où les so: Fixed bugs in case the sound systems were added manually
changelog.md.IMPORTANT NE MARCHE QUE AVEC PHP7, VOIR: IMPORTANT ONLY WORKS WITH PHP7, SEE JEEDOM HEALTH PAGE FOR YOUR VERSION
changelog.md.Prise en charge de la nouvelle api Sonos: Support for the new Sonos API
changelog.md.Prise en charge des sonos beam et One: Support for Beam and One sound systems
changelog.md.Certaines fonctionnalités ont dû être re: Some features had to be removed
changelog.md.Prise en charge des Sonos One et Playbas: Support for Sonos One and Playbase
changelog.md.Ajout de picotts pour la génération du T: Addition of picotts for local TTS generation
changelog.md.Correction du bouton play\/pause lors de: Correction of the play / pause button when updating the widget

index.md.Le plugin Sonos permet de piloter les So: The Sonos plugin allows you to control the Sonos Play 1, 3, 5, Sonos Connect, Sonos Connect AMP, Sonos Playbar, Ikea Symfonisk... It will allow you to see the status of the Sonos and to perform actions ( play, pause, next, previous, volume, choice of a playlist…
index.md.La configuration est très simple, après: The configuration is very simple, after downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it, install the dependencies and start the daemon
index.md.Le plugin va rechercher les Sonos sur vo: The plugin will search for Sonos on your network and create the equipment automatically
index.md.De plus, s'il y a une correspondance ent: In addition, if there is a match between Jeedom objects and Sonos rooms, Jeedom will automatically assign Sonos to the right rooms
index.md.Vos équipements Sonos doivent être joign: Your Sonos equipment must be reachable directly by the machine hosting Jeedom (broadcast / multicast possible on the same network) and they must be able to reach Jeedom in return on TCP port 1400
index.md.Si plus tard vous ajoutez un Sonos, vous: If you later add a Sonos, you can click
index.md.dans la page des équipements ou redémarr: in the equipment page or restart the daemon
index.md.Configurez ici le nom d'hôte de la machi: Configure here the host name of the machine (or its IP), the name of the share (without the path, without '/') and the path to the folder
index.md.La configuration des équipements Sonos e: The configuration of Sonos equipment is accessible from the Plugins menu then multimedia
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the usual configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.Ainsi que des informations sur votre Son: As well as information about your Sonos
index.md.Il n'y a aucune configuration spécifique: There is no specific configuration to perform
index.md.Les commandes infos seront mises à jour: The information controls will be updated in near real time (normally a few seconds maximum) but the image of the album currently playing may take a little longer to display on the widget when a change occurs. track, this is perfectly normal and independent of the plugin
index.md.il doit récupérer l'image depuis une sou: he must retrieve the image from an external source (on a Sonos or on the internet) and this sometimes takes several seconds (in principle maximum around ten seconds
index.md.Ces commandes vont toujours contrôler l': These commands will always control the corresponding equipment, including when it is in a group
index.md.augmente le volume de 1%; peut être util: increases volume by 1%; can be useful for integration with other systems or plugins
index.md.diminue le volume de 1%; peut être utile: decreases volume by 1%; can be useful for integration with other systems or plugins
index.md.permet d'effectuer des transitions de ni: allows you to perform volume level transitions directly managed by the Sonos speaker, it is not the plugin that takes care of this and therefore it is not blocking but the delays are not configurable since defined by Sonos
index.md.Le type de transition et le volume cible: The transition type and target volume must be chosen when executing the command
index.md.transition linéaire depuis le volume act: linear transition from current volume to target volume (increase or decrease), speed is 1
index.md.initialise le volume à 0, pause d'enviro: initializes the volume to 0, pauses for about 30 seconds and then increases to the requested volume at a speed of 2
index.md.initialise le volume à 0 et augmente rap: initializes the volume to 0 and rapidly increases to the requested volume at a rate of 50 per second (a transition
index.md.indique si on est en mode muet ou non: indicates whether we are in mute mode or not
index.md.qui gère la balance selon une valeur com: which manages the balance according to a value between -100 (far left) and 100 (far right) for compatible Sonos
index.md.qui gère les graves selon une valeur com: which manages the bass according to a value between -10 and 10
index.md.qui gère la aigus selon une valeur compr: which manages the treble according to a value between -10 and 10
index.md.Active et désactive la led, le voyant d': Activates and deactivates the LED, the status indicator
index.md.indique si le voyant d'état est allumé o: indicates whether the status light is on or not
index.md.Cette info n'est mise à jour qu'une fois: This information is only updated once per minute in case it is modified outside Jeedom
index.md.Active et désactive les boutons physique: Enables and disables physical or touch buttons on Sonos
index.md.indique si les commandes tactiles sont a: indicates whether touch controls are enabled or not
index.md.qui indique si le micro est activé ou no: which indicates whether the microphone is activated or not on Sonos equipped with a microphone
index.md.sur les Sonos équipés d'une batterie ind: on Sonos equipped with a battery indicating the battery charge percentage
on Sonos equipped with a battery indicating whether charging is in progress or not
index.md.Ces commandes indiqueront et contrôleron: These commands will indicate and control the current playback on the equipment or on the group if it is grouped and this in a transparent way, you do not have to worry about knowing if the equipment is grouped or not to use them
index.md.statut de lecteur traduit dans la langue: reader status translated into the language configured under Jeedom
index.md.qui donne la valeur \"brut\" du statut d: which gives the "raw" value of the reading status
index.md.indique si on est en mode aléatoire ou n: indicates if we are in random mode or not
index.md.inverse le statut du mode aléatoire: reverse the status of random mode
index.md.indique si on est en mode répété ou non: indicates if we are in repeat mode or not
index.md.inverse le statut du mode \"répéter: reverse the status of the "repeat" mode
index.md.pour contrôler et activer ou non le: to control and activate or not the
index.md.permet de choisir parmi les possibilités: allows you to choose from the following possibilities
index.md.Je recommande d'utiliser cette commande-: I recommend using this command in a scenario instead of
index.md.afin d'arriver dans la configuration dés: in order to arrive at the desired configuration even if all act on the same parameters
index.md.Cette commande est par contre le seul mo: This command is, however, the only way to switch to mode
index.md.donnant l'état actuel qui sera une des v: giving the current state which will be one of the values cited above
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: message type command to launch a playlist, just put the name of the playlist in the title
index.md.Dans un scénario, une liste de possibili: In a scenario, a list of possibilities will automatically be displayed when you start typing
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: message type command to launch a favorite, all you have to do in the title is to put the name of the favorite
index.md.celle ci doit être dans les radios favor: this must be in the favorite radios
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: message type command to launch a radio station, all you have to do is put the name of the radio in the title
index.md.Ne fonctionne plus sur les modèles \"S2\: No longer works on "S2" models, it is normal to have an empty list on all models using the Sonos S2 app
index.md.permet de lire une radio mp3 via une URL: allows you to play an mp3 radio via a URL (for example from the internet
index.md.Vous devez mettre un titre dans la zone: You must put a title in the box
index.md.nom de la piste en cours de lecture: name of the track currently playing
index.md.permet de lire un texte sur le Sonos (vo: allows to read a text on Sonos (see TTS part
index.md.Dans le titre vous pouvez mettre le volu: In the title you can set the volume and in the message, the message to read
index.md.Les playlists et les favoris doivent êtr: Playlists and favorites must be created via the Sonos app (on mobile or computer) then synchronization must be done to update the equipment and be able to use it in a scenario
index.md.Ces commandes agissent toujours sur l'éq: These commands always act on the corresponding equipment
index.md.indique si l'équipement est groupé ou no: indicates whether the equipment is grouped or not
index.md.dans le cas où l'équipement est groupé,: if the equipment is grouped, give the name of the group
index.md.permet de rejoindre le groupe du haut-pa: allows you to join the group of the given speaker (a Sonos) (to associate 2 Sonos for example
index.md.Il faut mettre le nom de la pièce du son: You must enter the name of the sound system room to join
index.md.Cela peut-être n'importe quel membre d'u: This can be any member of an existing group, it doesn't have to be the group coordinator, or an isolated Sonos
index.md.permet de quitter le groupe: allows you to leave the group
index.md.permet de grouper tous les Sonos ensembl: allows you to group all Sonos together
index.md.Le TTS (text-to-speech) vers le Sonos né: TTS (text-to-speech) to Sonos requires SAMBA sharing on the network (imposed by Sonos, no way to do otherwise
index.md.Il faut vous donc un NAS ou équivalent s: You therefore need a NAS or equivalent on the network
index.md.La configuration est assez simple il fau: The configuration is quite simple, you must enter the name or IP of the NAS (be careful to put the same thing as what is declared on Sonos) and the path to the folder which must contain the audio files as well as the name of user and password (note that the user must have write rights
index.md.La création du fichier audio est géré pa: The creation of the audio file is managed by the Jeedom core
index.md.la langue sera celle configurée dans Jee: the language will be the one configured in Jeedom and the TTS engine used can also be selected in the Jeedom configuration
index.md.le plugin va effectuer les actions suiva: the plugin will perform the following actions
index.md.génération du fichier audio contenant le: generation of the audio file containing the message with Jeedom core support
index.md.écriture du fichier sur le partage SAMBA: writing the file to the SAMBA share
index.md.forcer la lecture en mode \"Normal\", sa: force playback in “Normal” mode, without repetition
index.md.forcer le mode \"non muet\" (uniquement: force “unmute” mode (only on the equipment, not on the entire group
index.md.Modification du volume sur la valeur cho: Changing the volume to the chosen value when using the command (only on the equipment, not on the entire group
index.md.restauration de l'état du Sonos avant la: restoring the state of the Sonos before playback (i.e. the playback mode, mute or not, repeat or not, etc.) and restarting the stream if the Sonos was playing
index.md.Il faut absolument mettre un mot de pass: It is absolutely necessary to put a password for this procedure to work
index.md.Il faut aussi absolument un sous-réperto: A subdirectory is also absolutely necessary for the voice file to be correctly created
index.md.Il ne faut surtout pas d'accent dans le: Above all, there must be no accent in the name of the share or folder, spaces or special characters
index.md.Les messages trop longs ne peuvent être: Messages that are too long cannot be transmitted in TTS (the limit depends on the TTS provider, generally around 100 characters
index.md.Côté NAS, la config suivante doit être e: On the NAS side, the following configuration must be carried out
index.md.est partagé et il contient un dossier: is shared and it contains a folder
index.md.Côté Plugin Sonos, la config: On the Sonos Plugin side, the config
index.md.dans l'exemple) et son mot de passe…​: in the example) and its password…​
index.md.Le plugin Sonos met aussi à disposition: The Sonos plugin also provides a panel that brings together all of your Sonos
index.md.Disponible à partir du menu Accueil → So: Available from the Home menu → Sonos Controller
index.md.Pour avoir le panel il faut l'avoir acti: To have the panel you must have activated it in the plugin configuration
